title: Cleveland Browns was forced to issue a refund to 90% of the seasonal ticket holders?
subtitle: The publication of a "Satirical" website is a false allegation that some National Armed Forces teams have issued compensation to the majority of the seasonal ticket holders due to the controversial national anthem.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2017, Cleveland Browns, Dallas Cowboys, Pittsburgh Stillers, responded to season tickets in the light of protests by players during the national anthem.
